scripts.icons:generate: HTMLDIR=$(dirname "$npm_package_json") && npm run images:copy && python3 src-tauri/icons/generate.py "$HTMLDIR/public/images/E.png"
scripts.build: npm run build:linux && npm run build:windows && npm run build:android
scripts.build:android: HTMLDIR=$(dirname "$npm_package_json") && tauri android init && printf '\norg.gradle.java.home=/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64\n' >> "$HTMLDIR/src-tauri/gen/android/gradle.properties" && export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64 && tauri android build && apksigner sign --ks ~/.android/debug.keystore --ks-pass pass:android --out "$HTMLDIR/src-tauri/gen/android/app/build/outputs/apk/universal/release/app-universal-release-signed.apk" "$HTMLDIR/src-tauri/gen/android/app/build/outputs/apk/universal/release/app-universal-release-unsigned.apk"
